summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SAI Admin Dashboard. All core features working excellently including dashboard KPIs, candidates management, test results, query builder, export functionality, and audit logs. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend responsive and user-friendly.

ui_bugs.issue: Sidebar overlay click intercepted by navigation elements on mobile

passed_tests: Dashboard page loads with KPI cards (total candidates: 80, total assessments: 776, verified rate, flagged count)
Dashboard shows category average scores (strength, endurance, flexibility, agility, speed)
Dashboard shows candidates by state distribution
Candidates list page loads with pagination (80 candidates)
Candidates list shows filter options (state, gender, verification status)
Candidate profile page loads with personal information and category scores
Verify/Flag buttons work on candidate profile
Query Builder page loads with filter conditions
Query Builder can execute queries successfully
Export page allows selecting data type (candidates/test-results) and format (JSON/CSV)
Test Results page loads with 776 test records
Navigation sidebar works correctly across all pages
Mobile responsive design with working sidebar menu
All 13 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Backend handles 80 users and 776 test results efficiently
Filter options API provides comprehensive dropdown data
